title: I was charged more than once when I used GCash Watch Pay What do I do
content:
#### ADVISORY:

Bank Transfer to Maya will be right back! Our partner is working to restore the service as soon as possible.

## Articles in this section

- [GCash Watch Pay](https://help.gcash.com/hc/en-us/articles/39714168606105-GCash-Watch-Pay)
- [I was charged more than once when I used GCash Watch Pay. What do I do?](https://help.gcash.com/hc/en-us/articles/40997856280729-I-was-charged-more-than-once-when-I-used-GCash-Watch-Pay-What-do-I-do)
- [I can’t pay using GCash Watch Pay. What should I do?](https://help.gcash.com/hc/en-us/articles/40477864099865-I-can-t-pay-using-GCash-Watch-Pay-What-should-I-do)
- [I used GCash Watch Pay but the merchant didn’t receive the payment and/or SMS confirmation. What should I do?](https://help.gcash.com/hc/en-us/articles/40997758112793-I-used-GCash-Watch-Pay-but-the-merchant-didn-t-receive-the-payment-and-or-SMS-confirmation-What-should-I-do)

## Promoted articles

- [What are the steps to get a Fully Verified GCash account?](https://help.gcash.com/hc/en-us/articles/360017722393-What-are-the-steps-to-get-a-Fully-Verified-GCash-account)
- [Accepted IDs for GCash Verification](https://help.gcash.com/hc/en-us/articles/900000948786-Accepted-IDs-for-GCash-Verification)
- [How do I send money to another GCash account?](https://help.gcash.com/hc/en-us/articles/360017566614-How-do-I-send-money-to-another-GCash-account)

If you were charged more than once for a single transaction using GCash Watch Pay, [click here to ask for help](https://help.gcash.com/hc/en-us/requests/new?ticket_form_id=360000706713&ind=normal&tf_360023219534=scan_to_pay__i_was_deducted_more_than_once_when_i_bought_an_item.&tf_22502501824281=qr_i_generated_the_qr_code_via_watch). A customer service representative will contact you in **24 hours.**

### **Need more Help?**

For other inquiries or concerns, check out the following articles:

- [GCash Watch Pay](https://help.gcash.com/hc/en-us/articles/39714168606105)
- [I can’t pay using GCash Watch Pay. What should I do?](https://help.gcash.com/hc/en-us/articles/40477864099865)
- [I used GCash Watch Pay but the merchant didn’t receive the payment and/or SMS confirmation. What should I do?](https://help.gcash.com/hc/en-us/articles/40997758112793)
